com.voxelgameslib.voxelgameslib.persistence

Interface PersistenceProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Handler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyPersistenceProvider, FlatFileJsonPersistenceProvider, HibernatePersistenceProvider

    public interface PersistenceProvider
extends Handler
    A persistence provider handles loading and saving of all kinds of data
